holidays.title: International Hummus Day
holidays.description: We hear that there’s even some magical thing called a hummus festival - we’re not missing that!

holidays.title: National Apple Pie Day
holidays.description: Grab a fork and a napkin, because Apple Pie day is coming!

holidays.title: National Fruit Cocktail Day
holidays.description: There’s so much more to this spring and summer food favorite.

holidays.title: World Migratory Bird Day
holidays.description: Time to un-ruffle your feathers, because it's World Migratory Bird Day!

holidays.title: Archery Day
holidays.description: Draw your bows and prepare to celebrate the most iconic weapon of the ancient era.

holidays.title: Brunch for Lunch Day
holidays.description: Today on Brunch for Lunch day, take a break and go brunching with your friends.

holidays.title: Children of Fallen Patriots Day
holidays.description: Today, we honor the pain and sacrifice of children who have lost their parents.

holidays.title: Cornelia De Lange Syndrome Awareness Day
holidays.description: We get to help create awareness about this rare but very real condition.

holidays.title: Cough Drop Day
holidays.description: We’re learning all about cough drops and why they seem to be so addictive.

holidays.title: Fair Trade Day
holidays.description: Ready for Fair Trade Day? Here are all the details and celebration tips you need.

holidays.title: IEEE Global Engineering Day
holidays.description: It’s time you learn how to honor engineers as we celebrate civilization designed by them.

holidays.title: Martin Z. Mollusk Day
holidays.description: Help Martin Z. Mollusk bring us an early summer by celebrating his day!

holidays.title: National Anita Day
holidays.description: Discover and celebrate the women and the stories behind the name, Anita.

holidays.title: National Babysitter’s Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the ones who look after those dearest to you — your children.

holidays.title: National Birth Mother’s Day
holidays.description: Even if Hallmark does not traditionally acknowledge this special group of women, we certainly do!

holidays.title: National Crouton Day
holidays.description: An ode to this humble but oh-so-tasty food topping.

holidays.title: National Dog Mom’s Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate being a mom to your cute pups this National Dog Mom’s Day.

holidays.title: National Drew Day
holidays.description: We celebrate National Drew Day every May 13. On this day, everyone bearing the name Drew is honored for their achievements. Contrary to popular belief,…

holidays.title: National Frog Jumping Day
holidays.description: We bring awareness to different kinds of frogs and their impact within our ecosystem.

holidays.title: National Leprechaun Day
holidays.description: We’re rolling out the green carpet for the little leprechauns of Ireland.

holidays.title: National Miniature Golf Day
holidays.description: Get your putter and golf balls ready as we celebrate the fascinating game of mini-golf.

holidays.title: National Train Day
holidays.description: Trains, which are always fascinating, are now one of the most eco-friendly modes of transport.

holidays.title: National Windmill Day
holidays.description: Let's learn the origins of windmills and their role in shaping industries.

holidays.title: O. Henry Pun-off Day
holidays.description: Puns, wordplay, and wit — the perfect combination in O. Henry’s literary works!

holidays.title: Stamp Out Hunger Food Drive Day
holidays.description: Learn about poverty and how you can get involved in feeding the hungry.

holidays.title: Stay Up All Night Day
holidays.description: Stay up doing fun activities to celebrate Stay Up All Night Day in style.

holidays.title: Top Gun Day
holidays.description: Put on your aviation sunglasses and get on your fighter gear. It's Top Gun day!

holidays.title: Tulip Day
holidays.description: We’re about to stop and smell the tulips on this Tulip Day.

holidays.title: World Belly Dance Day
holidays.description: Explore the origins, evolution, and how best to enjoy belly dancing for fun exercise.

holidays.title: World Buckfast Day
holidays.description: Do not miss out on celebrating this fantastic day, but be ready to get a hangover!

holidays.title: World Fair Trade Day
holidays.description: The Fair Trade movement ensures fair working conditions and decent wages for workers.

holidays.title: Candice King’s Birthday
holidays.description: The popular “The Vampire Diaries” actress has become a fan favorite with her portrayals.

holidays.title: Debby Ryan’s Birthday
holidays.description: This very talented star has been acting for most of her life.

holidays.title: Falynn Guobadia’s Birthday
holidays.description: With her debut, the television reality star is already in the spotlight.

holidays.title: Haru Frenchie’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let us celebrate the birthday of the cutest French potato, Haru Frenchie.

holidays.title: Morgan Wallen’s Birthday
holidays.description: The award-winning country singer is crooning his way into the hearts of fans!

holidays.title: Quad Webb’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s a chef, a writer, and a T.V. star. Is there anything she can’t do?

holidays.title: Robert Pattinson’s Birthday
holidays.description: The heartthrob is making his presence known with his memorable on-screen characters.

holidays.title: Stephen Colbert’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented T.V. show host and comedian brings you late-night laughs.

holidays.title: Stevie Wonder’s Birthday
holidays.description: The iconic singer-songwriter-musician continues to be one of the greatest of all time.

holidays.title: Zen Shimada’s Birthday
holidays.description: When you say Zen, we say Parkour! Free run to the link to learn more.
